title: Windswept Courtyard
description: Crumbling archways and toppled statuary ring the courtyard. Three passages yawn open from the rubble.

onEnter.log: The courtyard opens before you, with three distinct paths leading deeper into the Citadel.

exits.log: You head through the soot-blackened arches.
You turn toward the crumbling shrine.
You descend toward the shadowed lower halls.
